Detailed Description

Functions for creating and reading archives.

Function Documentation

int fa_close_archive ( fa_archive_t *  archive,
fa_compression_t  compression,
fa_archiveinfo_t *  info 
)

Close previously opened archive and finalize changes.

Parameters:
archiveArchive to close
compressionCompression to use for the TOC when writing (else pass FA_COMPRESSION_NONE)
infoWhen writing, this structure will be filled with info about the archive (can be NULL)
fa_archive_t* fa_open_archive ( const char *  filename,
fa_mode_t  mode,
uint32_t  alignment,
fa_archiveinfo_t *  info 
)

Open archive for reading or writing.

Parameters:
filenamePath to archive
modeMode to use when opening
alignmentAlignment for resulting archive when writing (when reading, pass 0)
infoWhen reading, this structure will be filled with info about the archive (can be NULL)
Note:
Currently opening existing archives (already containing data) for writing is not supported, all archives will be started from a clean slate
